= Introduction =

Welcome to the Tekstorm2D Game Engine Wiki! This Wiki is a collection of knowledge about the engine. If this is your first time using the engine, please take a look at the [http://code.google.com/p/tekstorm2d/wiki/Getting_started Getting Started] page for a tutorial on how to setup Tekstorm2D to begin making games!
